scenario_text.value:
Oh, and Takuma? Jijimon is outside with
Poyomon and the other little ones.
Right. I guess they’re playing around.

(They were important to Miu. I have to
protect them, too.)

Let’s do our best, Takuma. But first things
first, we need to find Kaito.

Yeah, you’re right. We can’t stand to have
any more losses.

I don’t wanna lose Miu’s precious little
guys, or Kaito, or anyone else.
